name: Zsona is Sick
description:
Zsona is a little girl.

Zsona is sick.

Zsona has found a friend.

Zsona can't leave her friend.

———

Controls: WASD/←↑→↓ to move, CTRL/Left Click to use, SPACE to switch character.

———

A game made by Larses (textures, sprites) & Loupyboy (level-design, code) for the GMTK Jam 2021.
